logoutError: Failed to log out, please try again later

registration_success_message:
Registration successful!
We have sent a verification link to your email. Please check your inbox and click the link to complete the registration.

password_format_error: Password must be at least 6 characters and can be letters only, numbers only, or any combination of letters, numbers, and @ symbol
username_requirements: Only letters, numbers, @, _ (underscore) and - (hyphen) are allowed
password_requirements: Minimum 6 characters. Allowed: letters only, numbers only, or any combination of letters, numbers, and @ symbol
logoutConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to log out?
